Scratch your own itches

In a recent post, I discussed the extraction of the weather data from a local station as a means to preserve historic records and have data at the ready for any experiments and analyses. The local ETL does not cover a very common access pattern, which is obtaining information about current weather: what is the temperature, how much rain has fallen in the last hour, etc.
